summary: Provides a collection of utility functions and test cases to verify Flax encoder‑decoder models, covering model instantiation from pretrained checkpoints, configuration handling, generation behavior, attention output, saving/loading, and cross‑framework equivalence with PyTorch.
business_intent: Enable reliable validation and quality assurance of Flax encoder‑decoder implementations within machine‑learning workflows, ensuring they load correctly, generate expected outputs, preserve state across serialization, and match their PyTorch counterparts.
